parameter.name: ipAddress
parameter.label: IP Address
parameter.description: IP v4 address (and optional port) of the HomeKit device.

parameter.name: httpHostHeader
parameter.label: HTTP Host Header
parameter.description: The device fully qualified host name as discovered by mDNS (needed for HTTP Host headers).

parameter.name: refreshInterval
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: Interval at which the device is polled in sec.
